title: I need to design this Motorshop logo and I don't recognize the font... No serif and lower-case "t" is special
author: Sandrita Spain

comments.content:
Truth FB Medium (by Font Bureau):

[http://www.fonts.com/font/font-bureau/truth-fb/medium](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317184539/http:/www.fonts.com/font/font-bureau/truth-fb/medium "http://www.fonts.com/font/font-bureau/truth-fb/medium")

Your two samples appear to be artificially expanded (top) and condensed (bottom).
